amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow the emergency procedures authorized by the bill to be used on lands managed for timber production; however for all other lands, except where prohibited, the Secretary would be required to amend land management plans to incorporate salvage and restoration activities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 109-467 to allow the emergency procedures authorized by H.R. 4200 to be used on lands managed for timber production. For all other lands--except where prohibited, such as wilderness areas--the Secretary would be required to amend land management plans to incorporate salvage and restoration activities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 240 (Roll no. 148).
